post.description: Creates a new thread to a single project merge request. This is similar to creating a note but other comments (replies) can be added to it later.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: merge_request_iid
parameters.description: The IID of a merge request

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position when creating a diff note

parameters.name: position[base_sha]
parameters.description: Base commit SHA in the source branch

parameters.name: position[start_sha]
parameters.description: SHA referencing commit in target branch

parameters.name: position[head_sha]
parameters.description: SHA referencing HEAD of this merge request

parameters.name: position[position_type]
parameters.description: Type of the position reference. Either text or image.

parameters.name: position[new_line]
parameters.description: Line number after change (Only stored for text diff notes)

parameters.name: position[old_line]
parameters.description: Line number before change (Only stored for text diff notes)

parameters.name: position[width]
parameters.description: Width of the image (Only stored for image diff notes)

parameters.name: position[height]
parameters.description: Height of the image (Only stored for image diff notes)

parameters.name: position[x]
parameters.description: X coordinate (Only stored for image diff notes)

parameters.name: position[y]
parameters.description: Y coordinate (Only stored for image diff notes)
